comments.body: I realize this isn't a true test for randomness. The `or` statement is necessary in the cases where the test string happens to be the first item in the list.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +31,35 @@      assert:
        that:
          - item.1 != hostlist[item.0] or item.1 in hostlist
          - item.1 != hostlist[item.0] or item.1 in hostlist
      loop: '{{ lookup("indexed_items", inputlist) }}'
